name: Ni WooCommerce Sales Report Email
author: anzia

sections.description:
The Ni WooCommerce Sales Report Email plugin sends order status email reports at specific time intervals: every 15 minutes, every 6 hours, every 12 hours, and every 24 hours.

The plugin’s dashboards provide a comprehensive sales analysis report, showcasing the total number of orders placed, sales for the current month and year, and other essential data to boost your online sales.

Furthermore, this report features visually appealing graphs representing order status and payment gateway sales reports, along with a detailed breakdown of the top ten highest-selling orders.

WooCommerce Sales Report Email Feature

  • Dashboard Summary Report – Total Orders placed, Order Total, Discounts in Total, Total Product Sold
  • Ability to send the sales reports in email.
  • Provide setting option to set automated email received interval for every 15 minute, every day etc.
  • Provide setting option to set To email address, from email address and subject line.
  • Enable/disable automated email notification.
  • Filter option – Today sales, Yesterday sales, Last 7 days sales, Last 30 days sales, This year sales
  • Show top 10 recent order list
  • Show graphical/tabular order stauts report
  • Show graphical/tabular payment gateway wise sales report
  • Show total product sold report in email
  • Added cron job url

Pro version feature

  • Dashboard order summary
  • Order List
  • Order Details
  • Order Status wise sales report
  • Customer wise sales report
  • Payment Gateway wise sales report
  • Country wise sales report
  • Coupon wise sales report
  • Product wise sales report
  • Filter all report with date range, customer name, billing name, emaill address, order status and many more
  • CSV/Excel export

Ni WooCommerce Sales Report Pro version demo

  • View Demo

Support/Feedback Email/New Report Requirement

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins
  • support@naziinfotech.com

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate plugin from admin panel.
  3. Ni WooCommerce Sales Report Email.
  4. Enjoy Ni WooCommerce Sales Report Email.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email : support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.

short_description: Ni WooCommerce Sales Report Email plugin provides periodic email reports with essential sales data, order status, and top-selling order insights
